name: Rewind Madness
description:
REWIND MADNESS

Rewind Madness is a solo project for the Brackey's Game Jam 2020.2

You play as Bob, a guy who works at a Rent-A-Movie Store.
Your mission is to keep those VHS rewinded and ready for renting.
But don't think is an easy task.

Controls:
MOVE:  WASD / Arrows / Controller LeftStick
INTERACT:  Space / Enter / CTRL / Controller A Button
INVENTORY: Tab / Controller Y Button

Hope you all enjoy this game. 
I put a lot of effort as my first completely SOLO Jam Game
All Code, 3d and 2d assets were made from scratch exclusively for the Jam.
Music was composed just a few hours after the Jam ends... so forgive the lack of passion on it :)
Sfx are from freesound.org
Fonts are from various font sites, but not my property

Some of the artwork:
https://www.artstation.com/artwork/D5LzlG

Tools used:

- Unity 2020.2
- Blender 2.83
- Gimp 2.10.12
- SoundForge 13
- BoscaCeoil
